name: Super Santa!
description:
Run and Jump on the head of the bombermans and help Santa Claus deliver presents that were stolen from it's homes and reach the Christmas Tree!

Small fun game made for Christmas 2021!

***! MERRY CHRISTMAS !***

Controls and How to Play:

Move through the platforms while avoiding bombermans and trunks coming from the ground. Jump on the head of the bombermans to explode them and recover the presents they stole. After collecting a present, a snowy effect will appear on some houses around the platforms, you must jump upon the houses to deliver the presents back! 

  • WASD or Arrow keys to MOVE
  • Space to JUMP
  • ESC to PAUSE
  • Also supports XBOX Controller Joystick
